title: Accounts abote firefox.com & firefox.com.cn
content: I found that the accounts of the domain name account.com.cn and account.com do not seem to communicate with each other, which will affect the information synchronization of different devices.
creator: junhao16

title: Certain text turned dark in my dark theme
content: FF is fully updated. I use the dark theme, no issues up til now. Suddenly text in certain sections of my browsing is dark. I've tried changing themes, using system colors and not, nothing fixes it. I just want to be able to read all the text on my page again. See images for what I'm referring to. Any help is appreciated. Ff version 104.0.2 (64-bit) Windows 10
creator: BladedxRayne

title: 104.0.2 update has shrunk text size on all websites and is causing webpages to display improperly
content:
Instantly upon installing the latest update I've witnessed glaring issues across the board with Firefox that are severely impacting my ability to browse websites.

The two major issues are as listed in the title, all text is about 10-20% smaller, the ui elements displayed within web pages are also shrunk to this same degree (zooming in the page just makes everything appear distorted and thus is not an acceptable fix), and many parts of text or coding are broken on pages that cause them to display the wrong colors which make many sites all but impossible to read.

I do not utilize any of the windows settings for zooming or making text larger, I've already attempted to clear cache and cookies, and thus far I can't find any way to resolve the issue. To be clear, this is a firefox issue because other browsers such as chrome still display everything perfectly.
creator: SchwhatNow

title: Touch id authentication in Firefox on Macbook Air
content: Hi Guys, Why doesn't touch id work in Firefox like in Safari? I'm using Mac Air and would love to have this feature. Any guidance would be helpful. Thank you
creator: manjunath.sangappan

title: cookies.sqlite keeps deleting self, replacing with new file
content:
Hello,

My cookies.sqlite file keeps deleting itself after I start browsing, and after a restart, it replaces it with a new cookies.sqlite file. My actual cookies.sqlite file is 1536kb, and for some reason, that's the magical number that unfortunately is causing me issues or otherwise. Please help!
creator: weewooman

title: when printing a document it prints out very large, even if I click on fit to page.
content: I need to be able to print any document without having issues of enlargement of words or images. When I print with chrome the documents come fine. When I try to print with firefox everything is enlarged 3x. This issue just started happening within a few days or so. Please help.
creator: myradib

title: Delete Firefox Account
content:
Hello,

I would like to delete my Firefox account which currently uses an email that no longer exists. I still have access to the account. I can't seem to add a secondary email and set to primary as that process requires a validation code be sent to the non-existent email address on file. Can you help me delete the account please?

Thank you, Chris
creator: chris.mattei44
